title: Red Dawn
description:
Genre: Action / War

Year: 1984

Director: John Milius

Cast: Patrick Swayze, C. Thomas Howell, Lea Thompson, Charlie Sheen, Darren Dalton, Jennifer Grey, Brad Savage, Doug Toby, Ben Johnson, Harry Dean Stanton, Ron O?Neal, William Smith, Vladek Sheybal, Powers Boothe, Frank McRae.

Synopsis: "Red Dawn" envisions a mid-1980&#039;s America under siege from invading Russian and Cuban armies. Told at a boiling point of nuclear deterrence between the world&#039;s super powers, the threat focuses on a group of high school students who take refuge in the Rockies. First coping with survival and eventually fighting back guerrilla style, the students take the war to the invading armies in the hope that they can help turn the tide. As winter progresses; however, the group is worn down, physically, emotionally and mentally by war&#039;s attrition. As only a few remain, they must decide how to reach America&#039;s safe zones and see if tomorrow will bring another Red Dawn.

RunTime: 110 min.

Video: Pal Widescreen 1.85:1, 4:3
Languages: Dolby Surround: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German
Subtitles: Spanish, English, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Finnish, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Portuguese, Polish, English for deaf people, German for deaf people.
Other features: Interactive Menus, Scene Access, Theatrical Trailer.

DVD: DVD-9 -> DVD-9

More Info: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0087985/
